channel.title: My progress
channel.description:
im editing Allstar V.2 and heres some of my progress and just started i dont know how to read java and im new at this
[b][u]I've Added and updated[/u][/b] [b]New spawn area[/b] [b]New starter[/b] [b]New starting equiped items[/b] [b]Able to pickpocket other players[/b] [b]New high cb lvl 172 & new max skill lvl 135[/b] [b]Toke follow & ban out of option's[/b]
well this is my progress on my new server SkillerScape the base is Allstar v.2 im editing it to make it better and better

item.title: My progress
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

this tut is by steve4448 of coderzscape
http://coderzscape.nationvoice.com/forum/index.php/topic,79.0.html

First of all goto Client.Java find this:

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <=

PRESS TO U FIND IT!

Now you will If u got max stats 99 or 100 i got 100 so i would see this

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 100; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
			if (output >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return 100;
	}

so i got 100 …, if u want more change it to this

for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= YOUR NUMBER; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 150.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
			if (output >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return YOUR NUMBER;
	}

and tada ! you got YOUR NUMBER you want it to vary from 1-135… lol sometimes servers have differnt exps

this tut is by steve4448 of coderzscape
http://coderzscape.nationvoice.com/forum/index.php/topic,79.0.html

Read full topic
